name: Fidelity Asian Values PLC
description: Fidelity Asian Values PLC is an investment trust that focuses on providing long-term capital growth by investing primarily in a diversified portfolio of companies based in Asia (excluding Japan) and in other markets with significant Asian exposure. The company was established to offer investors a way to benefit from the growth potential of the Asian markets through a professionally managed investment vehicle. Fidelity Asian Values aims to identify high-quality companies with strong growth prospects and to invest in them at attractive valuations. The trust adopts a bottom-up investment approach, focusing on company fundamentals, and is managed by a team of experienced investment professionals at Fidelity International. With a commitment to delivering sustainable returns, the trust also emphasizes responsible investment practices, considering environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors in its investment decisions. As Asia continues to evolve and grow economically, Fidelity Asian Values seeks to leverage the opportunities presented by this dynamic region, providing investors with an avenue to participate in its success.
